mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu (id_, menu_name, menu_type, parent_id, iconcls_, request_, expand_, sort_no, is_show, permission_, remark_, enable_, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{request,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expand,jdbcType=BIT}, #{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isShow,jdbcType=BIT}, #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update sys_menu set menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, iconcls_ = #{iconcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_ = #{request,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expand_ = #{expand,jdbcType=BIT}, sort_no = #{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_show = #{isShow,jdbcType=BIT}, permission_ = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark_ = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable_ = #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id_, menu_name, menu_type, parent_id, iconcls_, request_, expand_, sort_no, is_show, permission_, remark_, enable_, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from sys_menu where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id_, menu_name, menu_type, parent_id, iconcls_, request_, expand_, sort_no, is_show, permission_, remark_, enable_, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from sys_menu
